letters.description: Evaluate the client's current Qi status through observation, questioning, and TCM diagnostic methods (pulse, tongue).
Determine the specific TCM pattern(s) contributing to the client's imbalance and symptoms.
Develop a personalized TCM-based wellness plan including acupuncture, herbal medicine, dietary therapy, and lifestyle recommendations.
Support the client in implementing the wellness plan, addressing barriers to adherence, and fostering self-efficacy.
Monitor progress, adjust the wellness plan as needed, and celebrate the client's transformation towards optimal health and well-being.
